scripts.lets-go: npm run build-spa && npm run replace-relative-paths ;
scripts.replace-relative-paths: replace '/nuxtfiles/' 'nuxtfiles/' dist --recursive && replace '/assets/' 'nuxtfiles/' dist --recursive && replace '(href|src|"href"|"src")="/' '$1="../' dist --recursive && replace '(href|src|"href"|"src"):"/' '$1:"../' dist --recursive
